name: The Love Cowboy
description:
(Use FullScreen button in corner to play!)

Left-click to shoot the criminals that roam your beloved town’s street

Right-click to send some love to your citizens

Any and all will accept the Love Cowboy’s kisses, and his bullets, so make sure you hit the right targets or else you’ll lose some points on your score! Rack up the highest score you can get before the timer runs out!

P.S. Aim for the head for some bonus points to your score.
